author: newsr.in
title: Khloe Kardashian Helps Arrange Flight for Lamar Odom's Ex & Kids to Fly to Las Vegas (Report)
text: Khloe Kardashian is doing everything she can in the wake of estranged husband Lamar Odom ‘s tragic hospitalization. According to People, the 31-year-old reality star arranged for the 35-year-old former NBA player’s father, Joe Odom, ex Liza Morales, and two children, Destiny and Lamar Jr., to fly out from New York to Las Vegas to see [...] »
